programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: When an architect finds himself hosting his family for Christmas, he turns to a holiday coordinator for help. Her expert Christmas spirit brings his family together, but neither expected it to bring them closer to each other.

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A community works together to help a couple bring an early Christmas to their sick 8-year-old daughter (Emily Alyn Lind).

programme.title: The Christmas Cottage
programme.desc: As maid of honor for her best friend Ava, cynical interior designer Lacey is tasked with decorating a honeymoon cottage for the newlyweds. Although it's a simple enough task, she didn't plan on being snowed in with the bride-to-be's sexy brother.

programme.title: Christmas With a Kiss
programme.desc: A woman returns home to help with her family's Christmas Carnival, and romance ignites. A photo journalist curates a surprise reunion.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Tidings of Joy
programme.desc: A skeptical writer shows up in Evergreen to get the scoop on the town's famed passion for Christmas during a search for a long-lost time capsule.

programme.title: Falling Like Snowflakes
programme.desc: Determined to capture a rare shot of a 12-sided snowflake, a photographer enlists help from a childhood friend as they go on a mission they'll never forget.

programme.title: Christmas Class Reunion
programme.desc: Reuniting at Christmastime for their 15-year high school reunion, two former classmates challenge each other to remember who they were, who they are, and who they want to be.

programme.title: It's Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent with a knack for turning around schools meets a single father who works as the head of the school's bankrupt music department. As she rediscovers her passion for music, she works to save the dreams of the kids who love music.

programme.title: The Most Colorful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A colorblind elementary school teacher meets an optometrist who helps bring color into his life in time for the holidays.

programme.title: Rescuing Christmas
programme.desc: Erin unwittingly wishes away Christmas, and Sam steps in to help bring it back.

programme.title: To Have and To Holiday
programme.desc: After a brief courtship, Celeste and Jason get engaged. Celeste then asks her pastor father, who's not ready to let his daughter go, to officiate their Christmas wedding.

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A photographer returns home to take care of her grandmother and gets involved with helping a neighbor look after his young nephew.

programme.title: The Santa Summit
programme.desc: At a Santa-themed holiday event, three teachers get their groove back, strengthen their friendship and unexpectedly find love along the way.

programme.title: 'Twas the Date Before Christmas
programme.desc: Feeling the pressure to bring someone home for Christmas, Jessie convinces Bryan to join her family for a day filled with holiday events, only the family doesn't know it's their first date.

programme.title: Noel Next Door
programme.desc: A single mother gets into a war of words with an irritable neighbor who is ruining Christmas, only to find that this misunderstood Grinch is the man who has stolen her heart.

programme.title: You, Me & the Christmas Trees
programme.desc: An arborist falls in love with a farmer as she tries to save his trees before the town tree lighting.

programme.title: Ghosts of Christmas Always
programme.desc: Katherine, a Ghost of Christmas Present, must help one soul rediscover his Christmas spirit, but this year has something unusual in store.

programme.title: Trivia at St. Nick's
programme.desc: Locals compete in a Christmas bar trivia tournament at the end of the semester.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly: Lit Up
programme.desc: Emily and Jared are looking forward to celebrating the holidays together again, this time as a couple. They're also ready to work with members of the community to make this year's Christmas festivities the best yet.

programme.title: Coyote Creek Christmas
programme.desc: An event planner discovers Christmas magic with a charming father-son duo while throwing a themed Christmas party at her family's inn.

programme.title: Snow Bride
programme.desc: A tabloid reporter races to find juicy gossip on a prominent political family. She ends up spending the week before Christmas with the family and falls for one of their sons.

programme.title: Catch Me if You Claus
programme.desc: Avery Quinn's shot at anchoring news clashes with a Santa-suited intruder, Chris, who insists he's Santa's son on a first Christmas mission. They unravel a career-making story together.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: A single mom faces Christmas alone until a stranger crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Run
programme.desc: Self-described bookworm Avery is paired with retired hockey star Wes to compete in a holiday race across America. The team struggles through themed challenges until romance runs its course.

programme.title: A Novel Noel
programme.desc: A NYC book editor takes on a temporary gig running a Maine bookstore. Battling with the owners' son, she rediscovers her passion for nurturing creativity.

programme.title: Karen Kingsbury's Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Maggie tries to maintain the balance of being a mother and having a career. When her son Jordan needs help at school, he meets Casey, a tutor, and the two quickly bond. As Casey becomes a father figure, Jordan wishes his mom could find love again.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man who may just be here to buy her family's parkland.

programme.title: Unlocking Christmas
programme.desc: When a mysterious key and a cryptic holiday riddle arrive on their doorsteps, Kate and Kevin embark on a romantic Christmas adventure.

programme.title: Welcome to Christmas
programme.desc: A developer finds herself stranded in Christmas, Colo. The town hopes to employ the Christmas spirit to convince her that the community is the best location for a new ski resort.

programme.title: Christmas Encore
programme.desc: A struggling actress finds a renewed passion for her craft when she is cast in an off-Broadway show, a modern take on "A Christmas Carol.".

programme.title: On the Twelfth Day of Christmas
programme.desc: Maggie is thrilled when Mitch, her long time crush, moves back to town. When she learns Mitch's love for Christmas has drastically changed, she tries to bring his holiday spirit back by showing him the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: The Angel Tree
programme.desc: A writer reconnects with a childhood friend while seeking the identity of the person who grants Christmas wishes placed upon an angel tree.

programme.title: A Christmas Treasure
programme.desc: After opening a 100-year-old time capsule, a woman meets a charming chef and wonders if she should move to New York and further her writing career.

programme.title: This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Despite a trial separation, Lauren pretends to still be with her husband, Kevin, to placate her overbearing mother. The ruse may be just what the couple needs to finally work on their marriage.

programme.title: The Christmas Ring
programme.desc: Reporter Kendra Adams searches for the love story behind an antique engagement ring with the help of the grandson of the ring's owner.

programme.title: Christmas With Holly
programme.desc: The owner (Eloise Mumford) of a toy store falls in love with a man (Sean Faris) who cares for his orphaned niece.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Meant for Love
programme.desc: A chance meeting at a weekend wedding celebration brings together Alice and Jack, two singles from very different family backgrounds.

programme.title: Every Christmas Has a Story
programme.desc: While on air, a TV personality accidentally admits she hates Christmas. When she goes to a small town to film a special to repair her image, the Christmas spirit begins to change her life.

programme.title: Northpole: Open for Christmas
programme.desc: During Christmastime a handyman and an elf persuade a businesswoman to keep the inn that she inherited from her aunt.

programme.title: Christmas Bells Are Ringing
programme.desc: Samantha, a freelance photographer, is returning to Cape Cod for the first time since the death of her mother years earlier. Having never been to the Cape during winter, she finds that it is a whole new experience than her many summers spent there.

programme.title: Just in Time for Christmas
programme.desc: A young psychology professor has to choose between marrying her longtime beau or accepting a once-in-a-lifetime job. To help her make a decision, a magical messenger lets her see both possible futures so she'll be able to make the right decision.

programme.title: Christmas at Graceland
programme.desc: A working Chicago mom brings her kids with her on a business trip to Memphis so they can all visit Graceland during the week before Christmas. But she is thrown for a loop when she bumps into an old flame from her days as a singer in college.

programme.title: Christmas in My Heart
programme.desc: Violinist Beth returns home after the recent death of her mother and tutors the daughter of a reclusive country music star to prepare her for the upcoming holiday concert.

programme.title: Christmas Bedtime Stories
programme.desc: When Danielle's husband goes missing in action during his deployment, she's left to raise her daughter on her own. Three years later, as she acclimates to life without him, she begins to tell her daughter bedtime stories about her father.

programme.title: Our Italian Christmas Memories
programme.desc: As their grandfather struggles with dementia, the Colucci siblings set out to re-create their late grandmother's legendary pasta sauce to help jog his memory.

programme.title: The Gift of Peace
programme.desc: Traci is a once-devout Christian who stopped believing in God after her husband tragically died despite her prayers. As her second Christmas without him approaches, she tries going to a support group for inspiration and comfort.

programme.title: Holiday Hearts
programme.desc: While planning an annual Christmas party, Peyton is forced together with Ben to care for a friend's daughter.

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Told she would have less than a few months to live without a new liver, Heather's time was running out when a kind stranger heard of her plight and discovered he was a perfect match. The two met and before long a friendship developed into romance.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Miracle of Love
programme.desc: Joy and Eric find a new sense of purpose -- and get a chance at love -- as they work together to build a home for a family during Christmastime.

programme.title: Holly & Ivy
programme.desc: A contractor helps a woman renovate a house so she can adopt a sick neighbor's two children.

programme.title: High Tops
programme.desc: A review of the best of the NBA from October and November.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: Stuttgart - Bochum
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta.

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama
programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalski kup: Moreirense - Porto
programme.desc: Pravo učešća na Portugalskom fudbalskom kupu imaju ekipe iz prve i druge portugalske lige. Prvo kolo rezervisano je samo za drugoligaše, dok se u drugom i trećem priključuju i prvoligaši.
